https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l7bxMGpWNs3Jue8NvQ9lO6f1jyA.jpg Vera and Erich Dorfmeister benefited from National Socialism . Times may have changed , but their spirit has stayed the same. Daughter Isolde in particular suffered from this , which is why her marriage to jazz musician Paul Richter broke up . Now their daughter Anna is returning Accompanied by her Jewish boyfriend Sidney after a year abroad . Edelweiss
